conversation.content: Um, hi. So basically I'm trying to pick a plan for my mom's—er, she needs the service but I can't tell what's what.
Hi there, thanks for calling. Let me—actually no wait—let me pull up our pricing guide first. What's the account number or—or do you have a reference ID?
No ID yet. She's sick. Cancer. So I need the... what's the word... the premium one? But there's three premiums?

Oh gosh, I'm—I'm really sorry to hear that. Yeah our tiers are, hmm, honestly confusing. Even I think—I think they could be clearer. So we've got Premium at $89, Premium Plus at $127, and then Premium Elite EPL-9000 at $199.
Wait. Uh. Okay but like what's actually different? She needs 24-hour access.

Right right. So the thing is—er, let me check—all three have 24-hour technically. But Premium, the basic one, code PREM-STD-89, only covers phone support overnight. The others have chat and video too.
Video? Um, for what? She can barely work her phone.
Yeah no I—I get it. Honestly? Most people don't use it. What's her main need? Like what's the... the core thing she needs help with?
Medication reminders. Er, scheduling. Transport to chemo. The basics.
Okay okay. So here's what I'd—hmm, actually wait. Transport coordination starts at Plus level, service code PLU-MED-127. But I wish I could just—look, the basic won't cover transport scheduling.
So basically hundred twenty seven minimum? That's... God. On top of everything else right now.
I know. I know, it's—it's a lot. Let me see if there's... erm, we have a compassionate care discount CCD-2024-Q4. Takes thirty percent off for medical hardship cases.
Really? Oh. Um. Wow okay so that would be like what, ninety?
Eighty-eight ninety. So actually—actually less than basic Premium. But there's paperwork. You'd need diagnosis verification form DVF-7A and, uh, income docs.
Papers. Great. More papers. Er, how fast? She needs this Monday.
Monday's... hmm. That's tight. What if—no wait—I can do provisional activation. Code PROV-TEMP-72HR gives three days while paperwork processes.
You can do that? Oh thank God. Yes. Please.
Absolutely. Let me—let me just get some basics. Full name? And, erm, actually I need the service address first for system setup.
Sarah Mills. Um. 4782 Oak. Apartment 3B.
Perfect perfect. Setting up account MLS-4782-3B now. And hey, I'm—I'm really sorry about what you're going through. The provisional starts immediately once I hit submit here.

scenario: confused about different pricing tiers and features
